title: "Benefits and Privileges" Card for Citi Handlowy Prestigious Customers
summary: Warsaw - Citi Handlowy is offering a special "Benefits and Privileges" Card for its most distinguished customers. Starting in September, Citigold and Citigold Select customers who hold a prestigious identity card may enjoy enormous benefits at Citi Handlowy branches and partners' stores. Among these benefits and privileges are the discounts at Poland's best restaurants, reservation of tickets for cultural and entertainment events, or professional tax advisory services.
tag-1: "Benefits and Privileges" Card for Citi Handlowy Prestigious Customers
tag-2: Warsaw – Citi Handlowy is offering a special "Benefits and Privileges" Card for its most distinguished customers. Starting in September, Citigold and Citigold Select customers who hold a prestigious identity card may enjoy enormous benefits at Citi Handlowy branches and partners' stores. Among these benefits and privileges are the discounts at Poland's best restaurants, reservation of tickets for cultural and entertainment events, or professional tax advisory services.
tag-3: "We decided to create the 'Benefits and Privileges' Card after analyzing the opinions of our customers about Citi Handlowy's prestigious services and looking into market expectations," says Tomasz Pol, Head of Segment Department at Citi Handlowy. "Preferential pricing has already been standard in the offer for VIP customers. However, I have not heard of any other bank that offers such a broad and diversified range of non-financial benefits. And this card is proof that we are fulfilling our commitments towards our prestigious customers. We are committed to providing exclusive services and setting new trends that extend beyond the financial world. And the new 'Benefits and Privileges' Card proves that we are consistent in meeting these promises."

tag-5: The "Benefits and Privileges" Card is available for purchase to Citigold customers.
tag-6: Additionally, those Citigold Select customers who hold the new card can enjoy access to individual brokerage services at the Brokerage House of Bank Handlowy (DMBH) and to international banking.
tag-7: For further details on the scope of benefits and terms of their use, please visit www.citigold.pl.
